# CartDiscountCode - Storefront API

Choose a version:unstable 2026-04 release candidate2026-01 latest2025-10 2025-07 2025-04 2026-01latest[Anchor to CartDiscountCode](/docs/api/storefront/latest/objects/CartDiscountCode#top)# CartDiscountCodeobjectAsk assistantThe discount codes applied to the cart.

## [Anchor to Fields](/docs/api/storefront/latest/objects/CartDiscountCode#fields)Fields- applicable (Boolean!)- code (String!)[Anchor to applicable](/docs/api/storefront/latest/objects/CartDiscountCode#field-CartDiscountCode.fields.applicable)applicable•[Boolean!](/docs/api/storefront/latest/scalars/Boolean)non-nullWhether the discount code is applicable to the cart's current contents.

[Anchor to code](/docs/api/storefront/latest/objects/CartDiscountCode#field-CartDiscountCode.fields.code)code•[String!](/docs/api/storefront/latest/scalars/String)non-nullThe code for the discount.
